title: Darius - cursor problems targeting opponent
body:
I played with Darius in a game just now and after activating his W I was unable to target the opposing player. I have give or take 1000 games with him so I know it wasn't user error. I assume the patch of 6/10 is causing this...

Thanks.

replies.body: Just played Darius in an ARAM. This glitch is still in the game and very annoying.

I play him often and have never had this occur. I know that a fix for his W attack speed reduction not functioning was in the PBE, but I don't know if it was released with this patch. Try testing that to see if it is reducing attack speed now, it could be linked to the issue.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/FMhYNEBG-dunkmaster-darius-or-maybe-just-darius-a-whole-glitch

Confirmed by Riot and they are actively working on a resolution.

> [{quoted}](name=Detroka,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=Bg7oWtoG,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-06-10T15:57:14.915+0000)
>
> I played with Darius in a game just now and after activating his W I was unable to target the opposing player. I have give or take 1000 games with him so I know it wasn't user error. I assume the patch of 6/10 is causing this...
> 
> Thanks.

Happens to me only wth Dunkmaster skin after successful pull. (blined away victim)
